body_text: The _from at the end is kinda confusing for a mapping; I couldn't figure out what the key of the mapping was at first. Maybe name this artifacts, or use a list with envvar keys instead? This is a nitpick though.
body: The `_from` at the end is kinda confusing for a mapping; I couldn't figure out what the key of the mapping was at first. Maybe name this `artifacts`, or use a list with `envvar` keys instead? This is a nitpick though.
body_html: The _from at the end is kinda confusing for a mapping; I couldn't figure out what the key of the mapping was at first. Maybe name this artifacts, or use a list with envvar keys instead? This is a nitpick though.
